sentences.en: Aural tests are objective and can be graded mechanically.
sentences.cn: 听力测验是客观的,可以机械地评分.

sentences.en: Five o'clock so soon? He got out of bed mechanically.
sentences.cn: 这么快就五点钟了? 他不加思索,起了床.

sentences.en: He commenced to say his prayers mechanically.
sentences.cn: 他机械地念起祈祷文来.

sentences.en: He nodded mechanically, his eyes fixed on the girl.
sentences.cn: 他机械地点点头，眼睛直勾勾地盯着那个姑娘。

sentences.en: However, reviewing courts have refrained from requiring agencies to follow precedent mechanically.
sentences.cn: 然而, 负责审查的法院抑制它们自己不去要求机关机械地遵守先例.

sentences.en: In this factory the bottles are filled mechanically; no hand touches them.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂是用机器装瓶, 而不是用手.

sentences.en: Never copy foreign things blindly or mechanically.
sentences.cn: 不要盲目地或机械地照搬外国的东西.

sentences.en: Potter had devised a system of mechanically searching these indexes.
sentences.cn: 波特设计了一种机械查找索引的系统.

sentences.en: She prepared quietly and mechanically for every evening's engagement.
sentences.cn: 她沉静而机械地为每天晚间的聚会作准备.

sentences.en: Start your creative engine mechanically - One of the biggest misconceptions about creative work is that it can only be done when inspiration strikes.
sentences.cn: 机械地启动你的创造引擎—— 最大的错误观念之一就是创造性的工作只能在灵感闪现的时候进行。
空气循环是靠机械驱动的。

sentences.en: The car was mechanically sound, he decided.
sentences.cn: 他断定，这辆车的机械性能非常可靠。

sentences.en: There existed between Marius and her an all-powerful magnetism, which caused her to do, instinctively and almost mechanically, what Marius wished.
sentences.cn: 在马吕斯和她之间有一种最强的磁力，能使她出自本能或几乎机械地照马吕斯的愿望行事。

sentences.en: This is a mechanically propelled vehicle.
sentences.cn: 这是一台机械推动的车辆.

sentences.en: We cannot apply mechanically other people's experiences.
sentences.cn: 我们不能生搬别人的经验.

sentences.en: We should apply advanced experience according to local conditions and shouldn't apply it mechanically.
sentences.cn: 对先进的经验我们应该因地制宜,不应生搬硬套.
